nodes.bodyText: doesn't really matter what this profile is called but we dont' really think it's ubuntu related..... i can replicate locally with mysql on mac ......
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@ jobs:
     - name: Build with Maven
       env:
         MAVEN_OPTS: -Djava.awt.headless=true -Dorg.slf4j.simpleLogger.defaultLogLevel=info -Dmaven.wagon.http.retryHandler.count=2 -Dmaven.wagon.http.pool=true
-      run: mvn test --batch-mode
+      run: mvn -PskipBrokenTestsOnUbuntu test --batch-mode

nodes.bodyText: its a different failing test on mac that must be configured to run tests with mysql which is not the default, but as you say it doesnt matter.... was just callng it what it was!
